name: MyTP 2.5: Ski, Freeski and Snowboard
summary: Ride wherever and whatever you want – from Slopestyle courses, Kickerlines, Superpipes, Big-Airs, Tree Runs to sweet turns in the Backcountry – MyTP gives you all the possibilities. No matter if you prefer to throw down triple corks, double McTwists or simply those wicked jib tricks - you can perform way over 1000 trick variations!
